nodes.text: Veil Three was a male Human Cyborg living during the Galactic War. Along with cyborgs Veil One and Veil Two, the three presented themselves as a single entity called "The Veil" to the Nar Shaddaa underworld. Around 3640 BBY the Veil took control over the production of the CN-12 sensor chip from the Cult of the Screaming Blade. When Sith Lord Kallig, who owned the Cult, approached the Veil for the CN-12, the Veil offered the chip in exchange for the leadership of the Cult.
Veil Three appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Nar Shaddaa.
